sentences.sContent: a special school for mentally handicapped children

phrases.pCn: 智力障碍的；精神障碍的
残障儿童，缺陷儿童；残废儿童

remMethod.val: hand(手) + i + cap(帽子) + ped → 没法用手来戴帽子 → 残废的， 有生理缺陷的

trans.tranOther: if someone is handicapped, a part of their body or their mind has been permanently injured or damaged. Some people think that this word is offensive.
